name: transport, freight, inland waterways, barge with reefer, freezing | transport, freight, inland waterways, barge with reefer, freezing | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/13121/documentation

This dataset represent transport of reefer (refrigerated container) on a freight barge. The operation mode of the reefer is freezing (temperature between -35°C and -18°C).;The amount of operation of the reefer needed is calculated using the assumption of the average speed of the barge.;Barge carying intermodal shipping containers, France (http://www.bollore-logistics.com/news/2013/03_com_semaine_devdur_en.html, accessed 20141216)

This dataset simply combine two other activities - transport, freight, inland waterways, barge with reefer and operation of reefer, For more information on these two activities please see the datasets representing these two activities.
category: H:Transportation and storage/50:Water transport/502:Inland water transport/5022:Inland freight water transport
